title: Recruiting for NO/FF

Hi ya guys Im Paora and....
"country: New Zealand
"best time to play for you: on ACC at the mo so i play most days allday.. but when back at work will only be after work
"summoners name: XxkayostheoryxX
"do you have discord: Yes
"what elo are you in: Bronze..... For Now
"what are your preferred roles: ADC or Top but i duo with my bro whos silver and mains Supp, Top and Jg ( hes a beast and really clued up)
Thanks all and nice to met ya :)
if you can get discord it's really a big help during ranked games pings work great but having a solid chat communication can get things done a lot smoother :)
i agree im always in chat (curse or skype) with my duo it makes the game so much easier.. will get it now
